title: 1 Reason To Expect Worse To Come For Enquest plc & SOCO International plc
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Wed, Jul 29, 2015, 12:42 BST - UK Markets close in 3 hrs 48 mins 1 Reason To Expect Worse To Come For Enquest plc & SOCO International plc By Owain Bennallack | Fool.co.uk â€“ 25 minutes ago 150.75 +5.0000 
Every company looks like a winner in the boom times, but when things turn sour they all look bad in different ways. A renewed slump in the oil price means investors in both Enquest (LSE: ENQ) and SOCO (LSE: SIA) should probably gird themselves for more bad news, albeit of different kinds...
